column4: USen

column3:
ハイラルの姫よ……
そなたの申し出 やぶさかでは無い
column4:
Princess of Hyrule. I accept your proposition
without hesitation.

column3: 喜んで厄災討伐に力を貸そう
column4:
You have my word. I won't rest until
the Calamity falls.

column3: ふふふ……(メッセージ表記off)
ははは……(メッセージ表記off)

あんなに真面目なウルボザ……
私初めて見ました
column4: I've never seen you so serious, Urbosa!

column3:
そうかい？
私の方は10年位前 ああいう御ひい様を見てるけどね
column4:
Oh my. I can't say the same. Ten years ago,
you rarely smiled, my little bird.

column3:
……ウルボザ

以前から訊きたかったのですが
貴女は何故私を「御ひい様」と……？
column4:
Urbosa, I feel like you've called me little bird before.
I was wondering where you got that name from.
Hm?
Halt. And face me.

column3: あんたらと違って不意打ちってのは性に合わないんでね……
column4:
Unlike you traitors, I prefer to fight my enemies
head on.
Do your worst.
Oh!
Urbosa!
You asked me why I call you little bird.
Huh?

column3:
あんたが小さかった頃……
私の友達はいつもそう言って幸せそうに笑ってた
column4:
When you were but a small child...my dear friend
called you that, with the sweetest smile that ever
graced our land of Hyrule.
You mean Mother...

column3:
10年前のあんたはさ……

母親を亡くしたばかりなのに一生懸命前を見て
精一杯王国の姫をやっていて……
column4:
It was 10 long years ago...Your mother had just left this world, yet her little bird
still spread her wings and became the beacon
of light Hyrule needed.

column3:
その姿を見ていたら……

いつの間にかね……
column4: Sometimes I forget myself...and get lost in the past.

column3:
ハイラルの姫の前だ
斬らずにおいてやる……
column4:
Out of respect for our princess, you may keep
your lives.

column3:
厄災ガノン復活を目論むイーガ団共が
我らの国宝を狙っているとの情報も聴いている
column4:
Not only are they planning to resurrect Calamity
Ganon, it seems the Yiga Clan is also after our
treasured heirloom.

column3:
ゲルドの長 ウルボザ……
ハイラル王の名代として感謝の意を
column4:
Gerudo chief Urbosa... On behalf of Hyrule
and its king, I thank you.
Now go.
